description:
Hiramatsu plans is to conduct a night raid on the Imperial palace and abduct the emperor. Can Shizuma stop him and prevent war from breaking out in Japan once more?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The River Never Stops, nor Carries the Same Water Twice
Yuku Kawa no Nagare wa Taezu Shite, Shikamo Moto no Mizu ni Arazu
ゆく河の流れは絶えずして, しかももとの水にあらず
